channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: My list of binge-worthy TV shows. Quite a bit out of date, but still a good list if you're looking for something to escape into for a while.
item.source:markdown: My list of binge-worthy TV shows. Quite a bit out of date, but still a good list if you're looking for something to escape into for a while.

item.description: 2017: What if TWTR is bought by a Repub? No one listened. They said TWTR's balance sheet wasn't worth anything. Oh yea? It just elected a freaking President of the United States. What is that worth? Twitter wasn't a cash cow it was a tool for overthrowing democracy.
item.source:markdown: 2017: What if TWTR is bought by a Repub? No one listened. They said TWTR's balance sheet wasn't worth anything. Oh yea? It just elected a freaking President of the United States. What is that worth? Twitter wasn't a cash cow it was a tool for overthrowing democracy.

item.description: Plex Adds Social User Reviews for TV and Movies. (Netflix should have done this long ago.)
item.source:markdown: Plex Adds Social User Reviews for TV and Movies. (Netflix should have done this long ago.)

item.description: Tim Carmody wrote "The Future of RSS is Textcasting" almost a year ago. A true visionary.
item.source:markdown: Tim Carmody wrote "The Future of RSS is Textcasting" almost a year ago. A true visionary.

item.description: Good luck America, love, the NYT. And goodbye for now.

item.description: Arizona Democrats close office after three shooting incidents.
item.source:markdown: Arizona Democrats close office after three shooting incidents.

item.description: The reason I’m having so much fun with this mofo is that I have most of the features of textcasting now, and it’s all flowing out through Masto, and I’m not typing into a freaking tiny little text box!
item.source:markdown: The reason I’m having so much fun with this mofo is that I have most of the features of textcasting now, and it’s all flowing out through Masto, and I’m not typing into a freaking tiny little text box!

item.description: Why does American television and press “both-sides” our politics? Why are such different presidential candidates presented as equally flawed? Why do the outrages of Trump, for example at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee, lead to the humiliation of Biden?
item.source:markdown: Why does American television and press “both-sides” our politics? Why are such different presidential candidates presented as equally flawed? Why do the outrages of Trump, for example at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee, lead to the humiliation of Biden?

item.description: The web I want vs the one we have. (My second day of blogging in Mastodon via WordPress, and I like it even more than I did yesterday.)
item.source:markdown: The web I want vs the one we have. (My second day of blogging in Mastodon via WordPress, and I like it even more than I did yesterday.)

item.description: Trump's top general calls former president "fascist" and "dangerous" threat. (Not exactly news, but it’s nice to see one pub report it, even if it is just a quote.)
item.source:markdown: Trump's top general calls former president "fascist" and "dangerous" threat. (Not exactly news, but it’s nice to see one pub report it, even if it is just a quote.)

item.description: Scripting News: The web lives in WordPress and Mastodon. I am more excited about the web than I have been in a long time.
item.source:markdown: Scripting News: The web lives in WordPress and Mastodon. I am more excited about the web than I have been in a long time.

item.description: Gay Grimace Mets Better Win on Pride Night.
item.source:markdown: Gay Grimace Mets Better Win on Pride Night.

item.description: The Regime is a shitty HBO series, but I like it anyway. Sometimes crud is fun. And of course Kate Winslet is a treat.
item.source:markdown: The Regime is a shitty HBO series, but I like it anyway. Sometimes crud is fun. And of course Kate Winslet is a treat.

item.description: Tesla’s value drops $60bn after investors fail to hail self-driving ‘Cybercab.’

item.description: I've decided to start using my wordpress/mastodon site to do some real blogging. It's good because I can write for it anywhere there's a web browser, unlike my main blog which these days is pretty much tied into my desktop system.
item.source:markdown: I've decided to start using my wordpress/mastodon site to do some real blogging. It's good because I can write for it anywhere there's a web browser, unlike my main blog which these days is pretty much tied into my desktop system.

item.description: “A young woman looking ahead to her future doesn’t have to be brainwashed to decide that she wants the right to decide when and whether to have a child.”
item.source:markdown: “A young woman looking ahead to her future doesn’t have to be brainwashed to decide that she wants the right to decide when and whether to have a child.”

item.description: I would switch to any podcatcher that let me edit my subscription list outside their app, because I use that list in different contexts, also because I’d like to share my list with others, also because there are lots of others, aka influencers who’d like to too. You’d own the market if you did this.
item.source:markdown: I would switch to any podcatcher that let me edit my subscription list outside their app, because I use that list in different contexts, also because I’d like to share my list with others, also because there are lots of others, aka influencers who’d like to too. You’d own the market if you did this.

item.description: Cynicism isn’t always the right explanation. Sometimes people just want to share something good with you, that doesn’t necessarily mean they’re stupid, maybe they just like you. 😀
item.source:markdown: Cynicism isn’t always the right explanation. Sometimes people just want to share something good with you, that doesn’t necessarily mean they’re stupid, maybe they just like you. 😀

item.description: How the fediverse could work. 1. Copy the URL of a post from one site. 2. Paste it into a post on another site. That's how you open a wormhole into another universe.
item.source:markdown: How the fediverse could work. 1\. Copy the URL of a post from one site. 2\. Paste it into a post on another site. That's how you open a wormhole into another universe.

item.description: Obama in 2009 had a chance: “People around the campaign were BEGGING him to keep the movement infrastructure alive and he scuttled it for a strategy of glazing of the biggest shitstains in the world.” Obama went for the money, not the people, and we lost.
item.source:markdown: Obama in 2009 had a chance: “People around the campaign were BEGGING him to keep the movement infrastructure alive and he scuttled it for a strategy of glazing of the biggest shitstains in the world.” Obama went for the money, not the people, and we lost.

item.description: Yesterday I briefly wrote up the mass market killer app for AI. I know this is it. Ten years from now people will think everyone always knew it. Before you click the link pause for a moment and think about it. Hint: Google should totally own this but they have a blind spot.
item.source:markdown: Yesterday I briefly wrote up the mass market killer app for AI. I know this is it. Ten years from now people will think everyone always knew it. Before you click the link pause for a moment and think about it. Hint: Google should totally own this but they have a blind spot.

item.description: Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT. I just got access to this. I think I'm going to spend the rest of the day trying it out on a coding project. I have a problem I need to iterate over with ChatGPT and that has been in general a frustrating process, iterating.
item.source:markdown: Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT. I just got access to this. I think I'm going to spend the rest of the day trying it out on a coding project. I have a problem I need to iterate over with ChatGPT and that has been in general a frustrating process, iterating.

item.description: It’s so funny how respectable Flushing has become. My hometown. Always found the name kind of embarrassing. 😳
